meta.description: Unified placement preparation platform: job search, DSA practice with visualizations, AI mock interviews, resume builder, 1:1 mentoring, leaderboard, and placement tracking.

techStack.styling: Tailwind CSS, Radix UI, Framer Motion, class-variance-authority, tailwind-merge, clsx
database: Neon (PostgreSQL) via @neondatabase/serverless — primary (Drizzle ORM + raw SQL)
Vercel Postgres (@vercel/postgres) — jobs and courses API
techStack.other: react-hook-form, zod, mammoth (docx), pdf-parse, React Flow (reactflow), lucide-react, sonner (toast)

pages./: Landing page (src/app/page.tsx) — hero, features, testimonials, sign in/up
pages./dashboard/courses/dsa/*: DSA topic pages (arrays, linked-lists, hash-tables, etc.)

apiRoutes.GET /api/courses: List courses (Vercel Postgres: courses, users, course_progress, course_lessons)
apiRoutes.GET /api/dsa/problems: DSA problems list (in-memory + OpenAI for hints); returns problems with test cases
apiRoutes.GET /api/jobs: List jobs (Vercel Postgres: jobs table), returns jobs with relative time
apiRoutes.GET /api/leaderboard: Leaderboard (Neon raw SQL from src/db: users + profiles, ordered by total_points)
apiRoutes.POST /api/points: Add points for activity (Clerk auth, Drizzle: users.totalPoints += 10)
apiRoutes.GET /api/profile/[id]: Profile by id (Clerk auth, Neon raw SQL: users + profiles)
apiRoutes.POST /api/resume/analyze: Analyze resume text (OpenAI), chunked for long content
apiRoutes.POST /api/transcribe: Speech-to-text (OpenAI Whisper), expects multipart audio file

files.role: Landing page; client; Clerk, Button, motion, Link
Root layout; metadata, ClerkProvider, PostHogWrapper, JSON-LD, CSP
Jobs list; cards, tabs, dialog, fetch /api/jobs
GET; in-memory DSA problems; OpenAI for hints
GET; profile by id (Neon raw SQL)
Clerk auth; protect /dashboard; redirect auth routes
Neon raw SQL; getUserByEmail, getLeaderboard, addPoints
Drizzle schema (drizzle.config); users, jobs, DSA, interviews, placements
Neon + Drizzle; db, query(); used by profile, points, interview
Drizzle schema; users (clerkId), mockInterviews, questions, userAnswers
OpenAI client; analyzeAnswer used by interview/analyze
Radix UI primitives (button, card, dialog, etc.)

database.drizzleConfig: drizzle.config.ts uses schema: ./src/db/schema.ts, out: ./drizzle, driver: pg, DATABASE_URL
tablesInSrcDbSchema: users (id, name, email, password, createdAt, updatedAt)
jobs (title, company, location, description, requirements, salary, type, recruiterId)
dsa_problems (title, description, difficulty, category, testCases, solution)
interview_sessions (userId, type, questions, answers, feedback, score)
tablesInLibDbSchema: users (id uuid, clerkId, email, name, totalPoints, signInStreak)
lessons (id uuid, title, content, courseId, userId, completed)
mock_interviews (userId, title, description, difficulty, topics, status, score, feedback)
questions (interviewId, content, type, difficulty, topic, expectedAnswer)

dbClients.src/db/index.ts: Neon raw SQL (sql`...`), helpers: getUserByEmail, getUserPoints, getLeaderboard, addPoints. Used by: API leaderboard.
dbClients.src/lib/db/index.ts: Neon + Drizzle with schema from lib/db/schema. Used by: API profile, points, interview/*.

components.sidebar: src/components/sidebar.tsx — Dashboard nav (Dashboard, DSA, Courses, Jobs, Resume Builder, Resume Review, Mock Interview, Mentoring, Blog, Leaderboard, Placements, Profile), SignOut, logo
components.ui/*: Radix-based primitives: accordion, alert, avatar, badge, button, card, checkbox, dialog, input, label, progress, radio-group, scroll-area, select, slider, switch, table, tabs, textarea, toast, toaster, use-toast

lib.posthog-ux.ts: src/lib/posthog-ux.ts — PostHog UX helpers (capture404, captureApiError, etc.)
lib.ai/interview.ts: src/lib/ai/interview.ts — generateInterviewQuestions(role, skills, experience, type) via OpenAI GPT-4, returns Question[]
lib.db/schema.ts: Tables for users, courses, lessons, sessions, mockInterviews, questions, userAnswers, userDsaProgress

middleware.behavior: Clerk clerkMiddleware. Protects /dashboard(.*). Redirects signed-in users from /sign-in, /sign-up to /dashboard. Matcher: all except _next, static assets; always for /api and /trpc.

layoutAndProviders.rootLayout: src/app/layout.tsx — ClerkProvider (dark theme, redirects), ThemeProvider, PostHogWrapper, Inter font, metadata + JSON-LD, CSP, favicon
layoutAndProviders.providers: src/app/providers.jsx — PostHog init (NEXT_PUBLIC_POSTHOG_KEY), PostHogProvider, PostHogWrapper (lazy load provider)

fileToPurposeMap.src/app/page.tsx: Landing: Clerk SignIn/SignUp, hero, categories, stats, features, testimonials, footer. Client component.
fileToPurposeMap.src/app/layout.tsx: Root layout: metadata, ClerkProvider, PostHogWrapper, body. No ThemeProvider in snippet but referenced in README.
fileToPurposeMap.src/app/dashboard/page.tsx: Dashboard home: cards, Icons, toast, quick links to DSA, jobs, resume, etc.
fileToPurposeMap.src/db/schema.ts: Drizzle schema for auth + app tables (users, jobs, DSA, interviews, placements, courses). Used by drizzle.config.
fileToPurposeMap.src/lib/db/schema.ts: Drizzle schema for Neon (users by clerkId, courses, mockInterviews, questions, userAnswers). Used by lib/db/index.
fileToPurposeMap.src/lib/db/index.ts: drizzle(neon(DATABASE_URL), { schema }), query() helper. Exports db, sql.
fileToPurposeMap.src/db/index.ts: Neon sql client, getUserByEmail, getUserPoints, getLeaderboard, addPoints.
fileToPurposeMap.drizzle.config.ts: Points to src/db/schema.ts, out ./drizzle, pg, DATABASE_URL.
fileToPurposeMap.next.config.mjs: images.domains [unsplash], webpack fallbacks (fs, net, tls, etc.), output standalone, Cache-Control headers.

importGraphSummary.from @/components/ui/*: Most pages and feature components (Button, Card, Input, Tabs, Dialog, etc.)
importGraphSummary.from @/lib/points: Dashboard courses (e.g. trees/visualization, graphs/visualization) for addPointsToUser

featureFlow.auth: Clerk (middleware protects /dashboard). Sign in/up on landing; redirect to /dashboard.
featureFlow.points: Frontend calls addPointsToUser() -> POST /api/points -> Drizzle update users.totalPoints. Leaderboard reads from Neon (users + profiles).
featureFlow.jobs: Dashboard jobs page -> GET /api/jobs -> Vercel Postgres jobs table.
featureFlow.courses: Dashboard courses -> GET /api/courses -> Vercel Postgres (courses, course_progress, etc.). Course [id] and topic pages (DSA, graphs, sorting, trees) use local theory data + visualizations.
featureFlow.dsa: Dashboard DSA -> CodeEditor, GET /api/dsa/problems for problems (in-memory list in route). Theory/playground/visualization under courses/dsa, courses/graphs, etc.
featureFlow.interview: Setup (POST /api/interview/setup) -> questions (GET/POST /api/interview/questions) -> answer/analyze/report. OpenAI for generation (lib/ai/interview) and analysis (api/analyze, api/interview/analyze). Transcribe: POST /api/transcribe (Whisper).
featureFlow.resume: Resume builder page, resume review -> POST /api/resume/analyze (OpenAI).
featureFlow.mentoring: Dashboard mentoring -> [roomId] page -> Zego video-call component.
featureFlow.profile: GET/PUT /api/profile (self), GET /api/profile/[id] (by id). Uses Drizzle and Neon raw SQL.
featureFlow.leaderboard: GET /api/leaderboard uses src/db index (Neon raw SQL users + profiles).

securityNotes.hardcodedSecrets: api/transcribe/route.ts and api/analyze/route.ts contain hardcoded OpenAI API key — must be moved to env (OPENAI_API_KEY).
securityNotes.csp: layout.tsx sets Content-Security-Policy for Clerk, PostHog, images, etc.
